### Ochre Jelly

_An orange puddle of quivering slime._

**LV** 4, **AL** N
**AC** 9, **HP** 20, **MV** near (climb)
**ATK** 2 tentacle +3 (1d6)

|  S  |  D  |  C  |  I  |  W  |  Ch  |
|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:---:|:----:|
| +2 | -1 | +2 | -4 | -3 | -4 |

**Split:** If cut or chopped, split into two smaller oozes (divide remaining HP between both).
